website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you prefer organic ingredients, although these bars don't offer as much variety or nutritional value as some others.
pros: Bars contain no hydrogenated oils or GMOs
cons: Some consumers say bars are very sweet and contain too much sugar

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She's allergic to nuts and never has a problem with these after eating them.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love that Amazon includes these as an add on item, we always toss a few boxes in our larger orders as the whole family loves them. And they are NUT FREE which is awesome for allergy families.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaduck

customer_reviews.title: Safe for peanut allergies, organic, and delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are the only safe granola bars for my son with severe anaphylactic peanut and soy allergies. This is better than any price in a store. I now just have the bars auto delivered each month since we are going through them like crazy during quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Peanut allergy friendly.
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find safe granola bars for my peanut allergy son and these are not only tasty but safe. I also love that they are organic! I buy these all the time for my three kids and they go quite quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LorenaW

customer_reviews.title: Great organic granola bars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved granola bars and now that I’ve found these organic kind, I can’t get enough, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: These are my children’s favorite granola bars. With 6 kids they go fast, so it’s great to have this large size box at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: We like these so much more than the Quaker chewy granola bars. These are chewy, have great flavor, and are organic!
customer_reviews.author: Iluv

customer_reviews.title: Favorite snack bar!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for a lot of these bars. Makes a pretty good snack too. (I hope to purchase more if they get anymore in like this.)
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Gave them to the kids and the ADT security guy
customer_reviews.text: There a good yummy organic granola bar , what is there to complain about ? And plus dark chocolate YUM!
customer_reviews.author: QN

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Healthy snack bar
customer_reviews.text: These snack bars are perfect for a quick pick-me-up or treat. I'm gluten free so need to be careful about my food choices and am thankful for these Chewy Granola Bars by Cascadian Farms.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: These are good, but for some reason they seem to get stuck in my throat.
customer_reviews.text: These are good, but for some reason they seem to get stuck in my throat. Maybe it's just me, IDK, but they seem to just sit there for a long time after I eat one.
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: Cascadian Farm Chewy Granola Bar Organic non-GMO Chocolate Chip
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time we had tried these bars they were Delicious will be ordering more they are very very good
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G Johnston

customer_reviews.title: School snack regular
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, good snack for nut free, sesame free class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy! Everyone in the family likes them
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find value size box
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my son who has a tree nut allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: Bars not very good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase four boxes a week from either Kroger or Meijer for my four high school kids. I bought two boxes this week from amazon. I ate one after my kid complained. The bars came in hard as a rock and the chocolate chips had white film over them like they were in a hot car then hardened back up. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these to take to school for a quick snack
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, yummy granola bar
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars! I usually grab one with a banana on my way out the door in the morning. They never make me feel sluggish and taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Peanut allergy
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for granola bars that are affordable, peanut free and tasty!! Kids love these
customer_reviews.author: cmaxx76

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love these granola bars. PLUS, there is no fear of it being made in a facility that has nuts. His nut allergy really makes it hard to find a granola bar he can eat.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey K

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: All natural ingredients and low sugar. I am a nutritionist and approve.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bianco

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product but DON'T BUY FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is delicious, however DON'T BUY it FROM AMAZON! Because of the way it may have been stored, too warm possibly, the product was comprimised, particularly the chocolate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Godess of Athens

customer_reviews.title: The best granola bar!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these as much as I do! Theyre healthy too!!
customer_reviews.author: D.Sandoz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wish Safeway didn't stop carrying these, they are the best bars ever
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: delicious bars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the normal store brand granola bars I'd usually buy and a lot more healthier too. Their delicious
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. They are not fresh
customer_reviews.text: Usually I really like these. However, this 10 pack is consistently old and hard. Recommend a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Lbarney

customer_reviews.title: Peanut allergic son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My son has a peanut allergy so it’s hard to find granola bars he can eat. Organic is a bonus. He loves them. They’re a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Mom65678

customer_reviews.title: Badly damaged when product was recived
customer_reviews.text: The box was spaced in half leaving the food all better up .
customer_reviews.author: Trademark

customer_reviews.title: 9 yr old tested & mother approved
customer_reviews.text: Im always looking for school safe bars.. took a chance on this one being he only likes milk choc. and he loved it! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tall mommy

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when grandson was 8 mos old. Still loves it 2 mos later. His favorite by far especially the beads.
customer_reviews.author: E2Mom

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: After ordering these off Amazon for several months with no issues, our most recent boxes were stale
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 Boxes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are absolutely delicious and they are exactly what I wanted!! The size is perfect, the texture is chewy and the taste is fantastic! I love those little chocolate chips!! I purchased these because I’ve been losing weight and thought these would help me when I want something kind of sweet yet nutritious. I believe I have chosen just what I need!!! FYI...I purchased 2 boxes and should have gotten more!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Beliveau

product_meta.title: Cascadian Farm Chewy Granola Bar Organic non-GMO Chocolate Chip 10, 1.2 oz Bars
product_meta.description: Size:1.2 Ounce (Pack of 10)Cascadian Farm Chewy Granola Bar Organic non-GMO Chocolate Chip 10 - 1.2 oz Bars.
feature_bullets: CHEWY GRANOLA: Organic chocolate paired with wholesome rolled oats for a tasty snack any time of day
CERTIFIED ORGANIC: Granola bars are made without GMOs or synthetic pesticides
WHOLE GRAIN: Made with 12 grams of whole grain per serving (At least 48 grams recommended daily)
ORGANIC SNACK: Contains no hydrogenated oils; no artificial flavors or preservatives
BOX CONTAINS: 1 value pack granola bar box, 10 bars
